In England, in the seven days to 19 February, there were 67,481 new confirmed cases (119.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 February, there were 80,783 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 16% (13,302 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 24 February is 3,630,729 (6,450.4 cases per 100,000 population).
